columns.Museum_ID: The unique identifier for each museum.
columns.Name: The name of the museum.
columns.Num_of_Staff: The total number of staff employed at the museum.
columns.Open_Year: The year the museum was established.

museum.table_description: The table provides essential details about various museums.

columns.ID: The unique identifier for each visitor.
columns.Name: The full name of the visitor.
columns.Level_of_membership: The membership level of the visitor, ranging from 1 to 8.
columns.Age: The age of the visitor in years.

visitor.table_description: The table tracks visitor details and membership information.

columns.Museum_ID: The unique identifier for each museum visited.
columns.visitor_ID: The unique identifier for each visitor.
columns.Num_of_Ticket: The number of tickets purchased for the visit.
columns.Total_spent: The total amount of money spent during the visit.

visit.table_description: The table records details of museum visits by visitors.
